languages.text: {n}Множество магосов пожертвовали жизнями, пытаясь установить контакт с великим духом машины, прежде чем он заметил, сколь хрупки их тело и разум пред его могуществом. Смилостивившись над слугами Омниссии, он смягчил свой электронный глас. И тогда техножрецы взмолились ему и попросили союза с Вольным Торговцем.{/n}

{n}Many Magi lost their lives trying to make contact with the great machine spirit before it noticed how frail their bodies and minds were before its might. Taking pity upon the servants of the Omnissiah, it softened its data-voice. The Tech-Priests then entreated the great spirit to forge an alliance with the Rogue Trader.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Множество магосов пожертвовали жизнями, пытаясь установить контакт с великим духом машины, прежде чем он заметил, сколь хрупки их тело и разум пред его могуществом. Смилостивившись над слугами Омниссии, он смягчил свой электронный глас. И тогда техножрецы взмолились ему и попросили союза с Вольным Торговцем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Many magos have lost their lives trying to establish a contact with the great machine spirit before he could notice how frail are their bodies and minds before his might. Taking mercy of the servants of the Omnissiah, he softened his electrical voice and, finishing his sacred calculations, allowed them to make a pact with him. His ever-watchful eye tirelessly watched the flows of the warp, granting his revelations to the Rogue Trader.{/n}

{n}Many magos have lost their lives trying to establish a contact with the great machine spirit before he could notice how frail are their bodies and minds before his might. Taking mercy of the servants of the Omnissiah, he softened his electrical voice and, finishing his sacred calculations, allowed them to make a pact with him. His ever-watchful eye tirelessly watched the flows of the warp, granting his revelations to the Rogue Trader.{/n}

{n}Many Magi lost their lives trying to make contact with the great machine spirit before it noticed how frail their bodies and minds were before its might. Taking pity upon the servants of the Omnissiah, it softened its data-voice. The Tech-Priests then entreated the great spirit to forge an alliance with the Rogue Trader.{/n}

Taking pity upon the servants of the Omnissiah, it softened its data-voice. The Tech-Priests then entreated the great spirit to forge an alliance with the Rogue Trader.{/n}

{n}Many Magi lost their lives trying to make contact with the great machine spirit before it noticed how frail their bodies and minds were before its might. Taking pity upon the servants of the Omnissiah, it softened its data-voice. The Tech-Priests then entreated the great spirit to forge an alliance with the Rogue Trader.{/n}

languages.text: {n}许多贤者在试图与机魂接触时失去了生命，直到伟大的机魂意识到人类的身体和思想在它的力量面前是多么脆弱。它怜悯欧姆尼塞亚的仆人，软化了它那数据之声。随后，技术神甫们恳求伟大的机魂与行商浪人结成同盟。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Many Magi lost their lives trying to make contact with the great machine spirit before it noticed how frail their bodies and minds were before its might. Taking pity upon the servants of the Omnissiah, it softened its data-voice. The Tech-Priests then entreated the great spirit to forge an alliance with the Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}许多贤者在试图与机魂接触时失去了生命，直到伟大的机魂意识到人类的身体和思想在它的力量面前是多么脆弱。它怜悯欧姆尼塞亚的仆人，软化了它那数据之声。随后，技术祭司们恳求伟大的机魂与行商浪人结成同盟。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Muchos magos perdieron la vida intentando entrar en contacto con el gran espíritu máquina antes de que este se diera cuenta de lo frágiles que eran sus cuerpos y mentes. Apiadándose de los siervos del Omnissiah, suavizó su voz de datos. Los tecnosacerdotes suplicaron entonces al gran espíritu que forjara una alianza con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Many Magi lost their lives trying to make contact with the great machine spirit before it noticed how frail their bodies and minds were before its might. Taking pity upon the servants of the Omnissiah, it softened its data-voice. The Tech-Priests then entreated the great spirit to forge an alliance with the Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Muchos magos perdieron la vida intentando entrar en contacto con el gran espíritu máquina antes de que este se diera cuenta de lo frágiles que eran sus cuerpos y mentes. Apiadándose de los siervos del Omnissiah, suavizó su voz de datos. Los tecnosacerdotes suplicaron entonces al gran espíritu que forjara una alianza con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}多くの賢人たちが、その力の前に自分らの肉体と精神がいかに脆弱であるかを悟られる前に、偉大なる機械精霊に接触しようとして命を落とした。機械精霊は、万機神の従者を憐れんで、自らのデータボイスを和らげた。すると技術司祭たちは、ローグトレーダーと同盟を結ぶよう、偉大なる精霊に懇願した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Many Magi lost their lives trying to make contact with the great machine spirit before it noticed how frail their bodies and minds were before its might. Taking pity upon the servants of the Omnissiah, it softened its data-voice. The Tech-Priests then entreated the great spirit to forge an alliance with the Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}多くの賢人たちが、その力の前に自分らの肉体と精神がいかに脆弱であるかを悟られる前に、偉大なる機械精霊に接触しようとして命を落とした。機械精霊は、万機神の従者を憐れんで、自らのデータボイスを和らげた。すると技術司祭たちは、ローグトレーダーと同盟を結ぶよう、偉大なる精霊に懇願した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}De nombreux magos perdent la vie en essayant d'entrer en contact avec l'éminent esprit de la machine, mais ils doivent reconnaître la fragilité de leur corps et de leur intellect face à sa puissance. Prenant pitié des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, la machine adoucit sa voix numérique. Les technoprêtres saisissent cette occasion pour lui proposer une alliance avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Many Magi lost their lives trying to make contact with the great machine spirit before it noticed how frail their bodies and minds were before its might. Taking pity upon the servants of the Omnissiah, it softened its data-voice. The Tech-Priests then entreated the great spirit to forge an alliance with the Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De nombreux magos perdent la vie en essayant d'entrer en contact avec l'éminent esprit de la machine, mais ils doivent reconnaître la fragilité de leur corps et de leur intellect face à sa puissance. Prenant pitié des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, la machine adoucit sa voix numérique. Les technoprêtres saisissent cette occasion pour lui proposer une alliance avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Viele Magi starben bei dem Versuch, Kontakt mit dem großen Maschinengeist aufzunehmen — bis dieser bemerkte, wie schwach ihr Körper und ihr Verstand im Vergleich zu seiner Macht waren. Aus Mitleid mit den Dienern des Omnissiah schwächte er seine Datenstimme ab. Sodann baten die Techpriester den großen Geist, ein Bündnis mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} einzugehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Many Magi lost their lives trying to make contact with the great machine spirit before it noticed how frail their bodies and minds were before its might. Taking pity upon the servants of the Omnissiah, it softened its data-voice. The Tech-Priests then entreated the great spirit to forge an alliance with the Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Viele Magi starben bei dem Versuch, Kontakt mit dem großen Maschinengeist aufzunehmen — bis dieser bemerkte, wie schwach ihr Körper und ihr Verstand im Vergleich zu seiner Macht waren. Aus Mitleid mit den Dienern des Omnissiah schwächte er seine Datenstimme ab. Sodann baten die Techpriester den großen Geist, ein Bündnis mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} einzugehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çok sayıda Magos'un onunla temas kurmak uğruna canını yitirdiğini gören ulu makine ruhu, haşmeti karşısında vücutlarının ne denli kırılgan olduğunu fark etti. Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarına acıyan Hiçlik Halifesi, veri sesini yumuşattı. Sonrasında Tekno Rahipler, Hür Tacir'le ittifak kurması için yüce ruha yalvarıp yakardı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Many Magi lost their lives trying to make contact with the great machine spirit before it noticed how frail their bodies and minds were before its might. Taking pity upon the servants of the Omnissiah, it softened its data-voice. The Tech-Priests then entreated the great spirit to forge an alliance with the Rogue Trader.{/n}
